# Delete a custom object definition

Learn how to delete a custom object definition.

Delete all custom object records associated with the custom object definition.

1.  Navigate to in the left navigation.
2.  Locate the custom object definition you want to delete.
3.  Click the Delete icon ![Delete icon](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/27058e0f-c08d-4fed-a45b-366f7f3de8f3?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..G53mqYloTvxW-twJGDuxtROvMlQA6TaGL4RcSLEyN1k).
4.  Click Delete in the confirmation dialog.
